items.title: Little Nightmares III on Nintendo Switch 2 now sitting at $30 Amazon low, more

The third entry to the brilliant Little Nightmares series launched last summer on Switch 2 and now Amazon is offering back down at the best price to date. You’ll now find Little Nightmares III on Nintendo Switch 2 down at $29.83 with free shipping for Prime members or in orders over $35. This is a regularly $40 boxed copy that is 25% off the going rate to match the Amazon all-time low. This is also only the second time we have seen this one down at under $30. For the record, the PS5 version is also down at $30 Prime shipped right now as well.

items.title: New PS5 Dualsense in neon glow colorways from Hyperpop collection now up for grabs
items.summary:
Sony kicked off 2026 with fresh new DualSense wireless controllers and PS5 covers as part of its Hyperpop collection. There are three new colors in this collection – Rhythm Blue, Remix Green, and Techno Red – all of which feature a gradient effect that shifts from black to bright neon. The DualSense controllers in these new finishes are now up for grabs at Amazon, and you can pre-order them now for $84.99 shipped. This listing also falls under the Amazon pre-order Guarantee, meaning you’ll be charged the lowest price if it falls to a lower price between now and the slated release date on March 12, 2026. Head below for more info and a closer look at this new gamepad.

items.title: Commute up to 40 miles on Buzz Bicycle’s Cerana 2 e-bike at a new budget-friendly $800 low (Reg. $1,499)
items.summary:
Buzz Bicycles currently has a strong budget-friendly deal on its Cerana 2 Commuter e-bike at $799.99 shipped, which we aren’t sure yet if this is the new starting price or just a discount. It’s been going for $1,499 up until recently, with most discounts over the last year having been to $1,300, like we’re currently seeing from Walmart, though 2025 did see it go lower than ever to $999 in the last few months. Today’s deal is better than we’ve ever seen, with this being a $699 markdown that either sets a new all-time low or officially fixes the price at this low. Either way, jumping on this deal now gives you quite the budget-friendly means to commute outside of gas cars and the like through 2026 and beyond.

more…

Already down from its $999 full price, this rate is a continuing discount that first popped up mid-December and has been riding strong into the new year.
